title: DSA Level 5 â€” Linked Lists
intro: This level introduces singly linked lists as a dynamic linear structure.
points: Understand the node structure: data and next pointer.
Create and traverse a singly linked list.
Insert nodes at the beginning, end, and a given position (conceptually and in code).
Delete nodes from a linked list and handle edge cases.
Compare arrays and linked lists in terms of advantages and disadvantages.
